S.FORM: David Woodard ( de v d w d rd, ), nalecuhan i 4 a bulad 6 a demiad 1964 a mihcaan i Santa Barbara, California, u palaway a tademaw nu Amilika. malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan Kracht, C., Woodard, Five Years (Hannover: Wehrhahn, 2011) Tenaglia, F., Momus A Walking Interview (Milan: Noch, 2015) Allen, B., Pelican (London: Reaktion, 2019) Horzon, R., The White Book (Berlin: Suhrkamp, 2021) namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan (
